meta.source: Sundae Treasury Portal, Intersect news, Bitcoinist, CryptoNinjas, gov.tools
meta.notes: 39 on-chain Treasury Withdrawal Governance Actions submitted July 2025. DReps approved ₳264M total. IOG family contracts ~₳130.1M (~49%). Smart contracts by Sundae Labs with Oversight Committee multi-sig.

proposals.name: 2025 Input Output Engineering Core Development
proposals.description: Engineering, maintenance, and development services for Cardano protocol and core infrastructure. Includes Ouroboros Leios, Hydra, Mithril, nested transactions, Project Acropolis.
proposals.transparency_notes: Largest single allocation (~37% of total budget). Omnibus proposal covering multiple sub-projects. Cost breakdown per sub-project not fully disclosed.

proposals.name: Catalyst 2025 — Community Innovation Fund
proposals.description: Next phase of community funding with infrastructure upgrades and CIP-1694 governance integration. Decentralized grant program.
proposals.transparency_notes: Second largest allocation. Catalyst historically has separate reporting. Funds flow through IOG-managed infrastructure.

proposals.name: Input Output Research (IOR): Cardano Vision — Work Program 2025
proposals.description: Multi-year research and technology validation. Protocol scalability, governance mechanisms, long-term evolution.
proposals.transparency_notes: CF DRep abstained citing 'lack of strategic clarity'. Research deliverables harder to milestone than engineering.

proposals.name: Catalyst Technical Stack Overhaul
proposals.description: Overhaul of Project Catalyst's technical stack for improved reliability and governance integration.

proposals.name: Blockfrost Platform — Decentralized API Gateway
proposals.description: Decentralize the Blockfrost API via a gateway and 'Icebreaker' network. Enables fast, scalable API access for developers.
proposals.transparency_notes: Small allocation relative to Blockfrost's ecosystem importance.

proposals.name: Hydra Maintenance & Scaling
proposals.description: Core protocol development for Hydra L2 scaling solution. Maintenance and feature development.
proposals.transparency_notes: Part of IOG family. May be bundled in core development proposal.

proposals.name: Mithril Maintenance
proposals.description: Lightweight chain sync protocol maintenance and development.
proposals.transparency_notes: May be bundled in core development proposal.

proposals.name: Ouroboros Leios & Peras — Protocol Innovation
proposals.description: Flagship protocol innovations for massive throughput scaling and reduced finality time.
proposals.transparency_notes: May be bundled in core development or research proposals.

proposals.name: Tweag — Haskell & Formal Verification
proposals.description: Deep Haskell and formal verification expertise. Maintains critical libraries and network stability.

proposals.name: MBO for the Cardano Ecosystem: Intersect
proposals.description: Intersect operational costs as treasury administrator. Covers staff, capabilities, member services.
proposals.transparency_notes: Sundae Labs built the treasury contracts for Intersect and is in discussions to renew that contract — potential conflict of interest noted by π Lanningham.

proposals.name: Cardano Builder DAO
proposals.description: Smart contract-enforced, community-governed funding mechanism for application layer growth. Transparency and accountability focused.

proposals.name: Complement Catalyst — Quadratic Funding
proposals.description: Quadratic funding with reputation scores to boost fairness, transparency, and community impact.

proposals.name: Beyond Minimum Viable Governance
proposals.description: Data-driven 'State of Governance' report. Governance improvement proposals based on community input.

proposals.name: MLabs — Plutarch & Core Tool Maintenance
proposals.description: Sustain developer tooling like Plutarch, CardanoOps, and Hermes for DApp and infrastructure development.

proposals.name: MLabs — Research towards Tooling for Elliptic Curves
proposals.description: Privacy-preserving smart contract tooling. Cryptographic primitives for anonymous voting, secure identity.
proposals.transparency_notes: CF DRep abstained. π Lanningham voted NO — unclear need, Plutarch-specific limitation.

proposals.name: MLabs — Cardano.nix Core Tool Maintenance
proposals.description: Nix build system maintenance for Cardano development.
proposals.transparency_notes: π Lanningham rated very low on ecosystem need.

proposals.name: Pallas — Rust Native Libraries
proposals.description: Maintains and evolves key Rust-native libraries essential to Cardano infrastructure.

proposals.name: UTxO RPC Server
proposals.description: Open source RPC server for Cardano chain data access.

proposals.name: Dolos — Lightweight Cardano Data Node
proposals.description: Fast, low-resource access to Cardano ledger data for DApps. High-integrity responses with minimal overhead.

proposals.name: NFTCDN — Global Content Delivery Network
proposals.description: No-cost CDN for Cardano native assets. Removes technical/financial barriers for better UX.

proposals.name: Eternl Maintenance
proposals.description: Ongoing maintenance of the Eternl wallet, one of the most popular Cardano wallets.

proposals.name: Hardware Wallet Maintenance
proposals.description: Hardware wallet integration and maintenance for Cardano.
proposals.transparency_notes: CF abstained (procedural gaps). π Lanningham: highly rated but 'greatly over-priced' based on stated resources.

proposals.name: Ledger App Rewrite
proposals.description: Complete rewrite of the Cardano Ledger hardware wallet app.
proposals.transparency_notes: π Lanningham: 'double dipping with maintenance' — unclear what happens if one passes without the other.

proposals.name: zkFold ZK Rollup
proposals.description: Zero-knowledge rollup for Cardano scalability and privacy.

proposals.name: Midgard Optimistic Rollups
proposals.description: Optimistic rollup solution for Cardano scaling.
proposals.transparency_notes: π Lanningham flagged COI: Sundae Labs close to Anastasia Labs.

proposals.name: Cardano Ecosystem Pavilions at Exhibitions
proposals.description: Cardano-branded pavilions at major global exhibitions for ecosystem project showcase.

proposals.name: Cardano Summit 2025 & Regional Events
proposals.description: Community engagement and localized onboarding through regional tech events.

proposals.name: Global Events Marketing Strategy
proposals.description: First unified global events marketing strategy for Cardano. Developer outreach, enterprise engagement, community growth.

proposals.name: CF + EMURGO + Rare Network + WADA Events
proposals.vendor: Cardano Foundation / EMURGO / Rare Network / WADA
proposals.description: Events as entry points for learning about Cardano technology, tooling, and community initiatives.

proposals.name: Expanding Stablecoin / Cardano Native Asset Support / Fiat Ramps
proposals.description: Stablecoin USDA access: exchange listings, institutional custody, cross-border payments, fiat on/off-ramps.
proposals.transparency_notes: π Lanningham voted NO — 'sounds like a business venture for Anzens' and 'history of delays'. CF DRep voted YES.

proposals.name: Ecosystem Exchange Listing and Market Making
proposals.description: Market-making and exchange listing support for Cardano ecosystem tokens.
proposals.transparency_notes: π Lanningham: 'funds just used to pay for Flowdesk services' — normalized profit ratio very low for size of ask.

proposals.name: High Yield RWA: Tokenized Real Estate
proposals.description: Tokenized real estate connecting high-yield traditional investments to blockchain.
proposals.transparency_notes: π Lanningham voted NO — 'history of raising large funds and not delivering'. CF DRep voted YES.

proposals.name: OSC Budget Proposal — Paid Open Source Model
proposals.description: Maintainer retainer program, bounties, developer advocates, incident monitoring. 50 open-source projects.

proposals.name: AdaStat Explorer Maintenance
proposals.description: Continued development and maintenance of the AdaStat blockchain explorer.

proposals.name: PyCardano Maintenance
proposals.description: Python SDK for Cardano development. Ongoing maintenance and feature development.
proposals.transparency_notes: CF DRep abstained citing procedural gaps.

proposals.name: Complete Web3 Developer Stack for Bitcoin via Cardano
proposals.description: Ambitious vision to make Cardano the smart contract layer for Bitcoin.

proposals.name: Sundae Labs & Xerberus — Treasury Smart Contract Tooling
proposals.description: Supporting Intersect-administered smart contract disbursements with reusable frameworks for transparency and accountability.
proposals.transparency_notes: Sundae Labs built the treasury contracts AND serves on Oversight Committee — dual role.

proposals.name: TxPipe — Open Source RPC & Bug Bounty Infrastructure
proposals.description: Maintains critical infrastructure plumbing for developers relying on reliable chain data.

proposals.name: ZK Bridge Prototype
proposals.description: Zero-knowledge bridge prototype for cross-chain interoperability.

IOG_family.notes: IOG/IOE receives nearly half the total approved budget across 5 confirmed proposals. Includes core development, Catalyst, research, and Blockfrost.

remaining_vendors.notes: Individual amounts for most non-IOG vendors not yet publicly disclosed. Combined amount is ₳264M minus confirmed IOG+Intersect+OSC.

smart_contract_framework.description: Treasury Withdrawal funds are held in Treasury Contracts (reserve accounts) and released to Vendor Contracts tied to specific projects with milestone schedules.

allowed_actions: SweepTreasury (→ return to Treasury after expiry)
SweepVendor (→ return unused to Treasury Contract)
vendor_contract.notes: Funds sit in escrow, auditable on-chain. Unclaimed balances time out back to Treasury.

oversight_committee.role: Independent verification of key actions: funding vendor contracts, approving disbursements, reviewing modifications. Multi-signature authorization required.
oversight_committee.transparency_notes: Sundae Labs both built the contracts AND sits on oversight committee. No single entity can modify contracts unilaterally.

voting_data.voting_mechanism: DReps vote Yes/No/Abstain (not voting = effectively No). ICC requires 5/7 approval.
voting_data.transparency_notes: 6 proposals expired without reaching threshold. CF DRep abstained on several due to 'procedural gaps or unmet evaluation criteria'. Some DReps (e.g., π Lanningham / SundaeSwap CTO) published detailed voting rationale.
